thread.section_title: tyresonthedrive.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of tyresonthedrive.com | tyresonthedrive.com | 59 of 1961
thread.title: Ros Allen

author: Ros Allen
title: Ros Allen
text:
All staff members I dealt with were courteous and helpful. The mechanic turned up within the allocated time, and was pleasant and efficient, even checking tyre pressures for me after he'd fitted the wheel.
I hadn't realised prices Quote: d were ex VAT, so was a bit startled to see this on my bill, tho the total was the sum I'd been Quote: d.
I'd certainly go back to this company, and will be telling my friends about it.
